attributes.action: Let students create petitions to fire teachers
attributes.additional_details: Students have to suffer with mean or bad teachers so it is only fair if we can fire them
attributes.background: To allow students to have the ability to fire teachers by creating a petition

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about taking disciplinary action against teachers, including dismissal, are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about a teacher you should raise this with your parents or school.
